name: lum-berry
effect: Held in battle : When the holder is afflicted with a major status ailment, it consumes this item to cure the ailment. Used on a party Pokémon : Cures any major status ailment.
short_effect: Held: Consumed to cure any status condition or confusion.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A hold item that heals status in battle.
flavor_text.emerald: A hold item that heals any status problem in battle.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: When held by a POKéMON, it will be used in battle to heal any problem.
